name: SprintAR
summary:
SprintAR is an Augmented Reality training app.

It lays out different patterns of training cones for sprinting, football, soccer or basketball. Automatically records lap times and shows a ghost replay for you to chase!

Never measure out training cones (witches hats) ever again!
Never have to collect them back up again, either :)
Includes many different cone patterns (no need to research them)

For personal trainers and coaches

Impress students with the latest technology
